name: fxcompared.com
tag_list: money-transfer, comparison, currency-provider, fx-broker, send-money-online, send-money-home, transfer-money, transfer-money-online
overview:
fxcompared.com is the leading global foreign currency transfer comparison website and, uniquely, is the only such website to advertise live exchange rates, create dynamic search results from customer search criteria and provide extensive international and currency coverage

fxcompared.com enables the user to save money by referring clients to specialist regulated FX Brokers offering the best overall currency and commission rates for the foreign currency transmission transaction the customer seeks

fxcompared.com saves visitors money by offering more cost effective alternatives for their currency transfers, as opposed to the costly charges and exchange rates imposed by banks

fxcompared.com was originally sendmoneyhome.org, which was created as part of a project funded by the UK government’s Department for International Development in 2004 to assist migrant workers remitting small amounts of money home, from the UK, to friends and family in emerging markets and was launched on the Web as sendmoneyhome.org in March 2005.

In July 2009, the company took the opportunity to monetise the site and consequently made the transition from being a government funded public information service focused on the migrant market into a fully-fledged commercial comparison website focusing on all aspects of the global foreign exchange sector. Today, fxcompared.com is focused on much larger markets, encompassing:

  • Individuals making personal transfers overseas
  • Corporates making overseas payments.

In 2009, it has received BT Essence of the Entrepreneur Award.

In December 2010, the name was changed to fxcompared.com to reflect more accurately the nature of the business.

relationships.title: Director and Technical Lead/ Head of Product Development
